panels.description: P95 latency of the scheduler's internal decision-making process (Kueue/Volcano/YuniKorn combined view using 'or'). Assumes comparable histogram metrics exist and are scraped. Namespace filter applied. Note: YuniKorn latency (ms) is converted to seconds. Lower is better.

targets.expr:
(histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(kueue_workload_scheduling_latency_seconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m])) by (le)) or
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(volcano_e2e_scheduling_latency_milliseconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m])) by (le)) / 1000 or
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(yunikorn_scheduler_scheduling_latency_milliseconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m])) by (le)) / 1000) or vector(0)

panels.title: P95 Internal Scheduling Latency

panels.description: Average scheduler throughput based on successful operations per second (admitted workloads for Kueue, allocated containers for YuniKorn, scheduled tasks count for Volcano proxy). Higher is better.

targets.expr:
(
  # Kueue: Admitted workloads/sec
  sum(rate(kueue_admitted_workloads_total[5m]))
)
OR
(
  # Volcano: Scheduled tasks/sec (proxy)
  sum(rate(volcano_task_scheduling_latency_milliseconds_count[5m]))
)
OR
(
  # YuniKorn: Allocated containers/sec
  sum(rate(yunikorn_scheduler_container_allocation_attempt_total{state="allocated"}[5m]))
)
OR
vector(0)

panels.title: Scheduler Throughput (Ops/s)

panels.description: Average time from Job creation to Job start (based on unified exporter metrics). Lower is better.
panels.title: Avg Job Wait Time

panels.description: Average CPU cores used by all scheduler components (Kueue/Volcano/YuniKorn). Lower is better. This is real usage, not simulated by KWOK.
panels.title: Avg Scheduler CPU Usage

panels.description: Current Memory Working Set used by all scheduler components (Kueue/Volcano/YuniKorn). Lower is better. This is real usage, not simulated by KWOK.
panels.title: Current Scheduler Memory Usage

panels.description: Number of pending units reported directly by the selected scheduler (Workloads/Pods/Applications). Filtered by namespace. Uses hidden queries based on $scheduler variable.
panels.title: Current Pending Scheduler Units

panels.description: Latency quantiles (P99, P95, P50) of the scheduler's internal decision-making process (Kueue/Volcano/YuniKorn combined view using 'or'). Assumes comparable histogram metrics exist and are scraped. Namespace filter applied. Note: YuniKorn latency (ms) is converted to seconds. Lower is better.

targets.expr:
(histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kueue_workload_scheduling_latency_seconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m])) by (le)) or
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(volcano_e2e_scheduling_latency_milliseconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m])) by (le)) / 1000 or
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(yunikorn_scheduler_scheduling_latency_milliseconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m])) by (le)) / 1000) or vector(0)

(histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(kueue_workload_scheduling_latency_seconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m])) by (le)) or
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(volcano_e2e_scheduling_latency_milliseconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m])) by (le)) / 1000 or
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(yunikorn_scheduler_scheduling_latency_milliseconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m])) by (le)) / 1000) or vector(0)

(histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(kueue_workload_scheduling_latency_seconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m])) by (le)) or
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(volcano_e2e_scheduling_latency_milliseconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m])) by (le)) / 1000 or
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(yunikorn_scheduler_scheduling_latency_milliseconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m])) by (le)) / 1000) or vector(0)

panels.title: Internal Scheduler Scheduling Latency (Quantiles)
Average Job Times
panels.description: Average times for Jobs (K8s & Volcano) based on unified exporter metrics, filtered by job namespace. Wait Time: Created to Start. Execution Time: Start to Completion. Total Time: Created to Completion. Note: Completion time is only available for completed jobs.

panels.title: Job Status Count
panels.description: Number of Jobs (K8s & Volcano) in different states based on unified exporter metrics (filtered by job namespace).
Total number of Pods in each phase over time based on KSM metrics (filtered by namespace). Provides a clear view of system throughput and potential bottlenecks.
panels.title: Pod Phases Over Time (Stacked)

panels.description: Average Pod start latency metrics based on KSM. Calculated as: start_time - creation_timestamp. Time difference represents scheduling delay + image pulling + init containers in KWOK simulated environment.
panels.title: Pod Start Latency (KSM)

panels.description: Sum of CPU requests from pods in selected namespaces as a percentage of total allocatable CPU across worker nodes.
panels.title: Cluster CPU Requests vs Allocatable

panels.description: Sum of Memory requests from pods in selected namespaces as a percentage of total allocatable Memory across worker nodes.
panels.title: Cluster Memory Requests vs Allocatable

panels.description: Sum of GPU requests from pods in selected namespaces as a percentage of total allocatable GPUs across worker nodes. Relies on proper extended resource reporting in KSM.
panels.title: Cluster GPU Requests vs Allocatable

panels.description: Time series of resource requests compared to total allocatable resources over time. Shows dynamic changes in cluster resource allocation across namespaces.
panels.title: Resource Allocation Trends

panels.description: Resource requests over time in absolute values. Shows actual CPU cores, memory bytes, and GPU counts requested across all pods in selected namespace(s).
panels.title: Total Resource Requests Over Time
Cluster Resources: Node Details & Fragmentation Proxy

panels.description: Shows resource requests vs allocatable per node, along with pending pods count (filtered by selected namespace and node). High pending pods count despite available resources on some nodes can indicate fragmentation or scheduling constraints.

targets.expr: sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace", node=~"$node", node!~"kind-control-plane"}) / sum by (node) (kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu", node=~"$node", node!~"kind-control-plane"}) * 100 or vector(0)

sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace", node=~"$node", node!~"kind-control-plane"}) / sum by (node) (kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory", node=~"$node", node!~"kind-control-plane"}) * 100 or vector(0)
sum by (node) (kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu", node=~"$node", node!~"kind-control-plane"}) or vector(0)
sum by (node) (kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory", node=~"$node", node!~"kind-control-plane"}) or vector(0)
sum by (node) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending", namespace=~"$namespace", node=~"$node"}) or vector(0)

panels.title: Node Resource Details & Pending Pods (Fragmentation Proxy)

panels.description: Node resource allocation analysis showing the distribution of pods and resources across nodes. Helps identify imbalances in scheduling decisions.
panels.title: Pod Distribution per Node

panels.description: Distribution of CPU/Memory request sizes across pods, showing the variety of pod sizes in the workload. Helps identify if the workload is homogeneous or heterogeneous.

targets.expr: sum by (value) (count by (pod, value) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="nvidia.com/gpu", namespace=~"$namespace"})) or vector(0)

panels.title: Resource Request Distribution

panels.description: CPU usage (cores) for each scheduler pod (Kueue, Volcano, YuniKorn). Assumes standard namespaces and pod name patterns.
panels.title: Scheduler Pod CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory Working Set for each scheduler pod (Kueue, Volcano, YuniKorn). Assumes standard namespaces and pod name patterns.
panels.title: Scheduler Pod Memory Usage
$scheduler: Queue Status
panels.description: Shows scheduler-specific queue length metrics (filtered by namespace). Note: These metrics are NOT directly comparable between schedulers (Workloads vs Pods vs Applications). Use the 'Job Status Count' panel (Suspended/Pending) for a comparable view. Queries are hidden based on the selected '$scheduler' variable. Check Prometheus if 'No data'.

panels.title: $scheduler: Internal Scheduling Latency (P95)
panels.description: P95 internal scheduling/allocation latency reported by the specific scheduler. Namespace filter applied. Note: YuniKorn latency (ms) is converted to seconds. Queries are hidden based on the selected '$scheduler' variable. See also the combined latency panel in the main section. Check Prometheus if 'No data'.

panels.title: $scheduler: Scheduling Attempts/Errors (rate/s)
panels.description: Rate of scheduling/allocation attempts per second, broken down by result/status, as reported by the specific scheduler. Namespace filter applied. Queries are hidden based on the selected '$scheduler' variable. Check Prometheus if 'No data'.

list.description: Select namespace(s) where benchmark jobs run.
list.label: Namespace
list.name: namespace

list.description: Select the scheduler whose specific metrics should be displayed.
list.label: Scheduler
list.name: scheduler

list.description: Select node(s) to filter node-specific views (excludes control-plane by default)
list.label: Node
list.name: node
